content: --अनंतर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} being in immediate neighbourhood. {2} standing nearest (as an heir). {3} immediately following, closely connected with; जीवेत् क्षत्रियधर्मेण स ह्यस्य (ब्राह्मणस्य) प्रत्यनं तरः <ls>Ms. 10. 82</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 185.</ls> (--रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} immediately after. {2} next in succession.
